FuncDef: The display als command displays ALS configuration. The display als command displays ALS configuration.
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,25GE interface view,400GE-L2 view,400GE interface view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,50GE interface view,User view,System view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Specifies the type of an interface.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.

Displays ALS configuration on all interfaces.
-

Displays ALS configuration on interfaces with a specified slot ID.
The value is a string of  characters. You can enter a question mark (?) and select a value from the displayed value range.
